description.oldValue:
With this change, Microsoft will start indicating using Tenant Allow/Block List page on security.microsoft.com and cmdlets if an allow created by the customer is malicious in nature. This will help customer remove allows proactively which might end up harming their tenant.
GA date: May CY2023
description.newValue:
With this change, Microsoft will start indicating using Tenant Allow/Block List page on security.microsoft.com and cmdlets if an allow created by the customer is malicious in nature. This will help customer remove allows proactively which might end up harming their tenant.
GA date: June CY2023
